content: this luncheon set is called **hawaiian luncheon set** in *treasury of pineapple designs for crocheting* this pattern includes instructions to make a centerpiece * measuring 15 5 inches in diameter * a place doily * 11 5 inches in diameter * and a glass doily * 7 5 inches in diameter * as listed in the pattern the materials j & p coats *or* clark s o n t best six cord mercerized crochet *size 30* **small ball** j & p coats - 4 balls of white or ecru or 5 balls of any color or clark s o n t - 7 balls of white or ecru or 8 balls of any color steel crochet hook no 10 no gauge listed
